  • Field Details

    • velocity

      @NotNull public @NotNull DoaVector velocity
      Velocity of the body.

    • angularDampening

      public float angularDampening
      Angular dampening of the body. Default value is 0.01.

    • linearDampening

      public float linearDampening
      Linear dampening of the body. Default value is 0.

    • mass

      public float mass
      Mass of the body. Default value is 1.

    • friction

      public float friction
      Friction coefficient of the body. Default value is 0.2.

    • elasticity

      public float elasticity
      Bounciness of the body. Default value is 0. Recommended value is 0.6 for bouncy objects.

    • type

      @NotNull public @NotNull DoaBodyType type
      One of the three body types. See DoaBodyType

    • collider

      @NotNull public @NotNull DoaCollider collider
      Shape of the body.

    • fixedRotation

      public boolean fixedRotation
      When true, the body will not rotate.

    • isBullet

      public boolean isBullet
      When true, the physics engine will treat this object as a bullet and apply continuous collision check to it. Prevents ghosting at the cost of performance.

    • canSleep

      public boolean canSleep
      Set this flag to false if this body should never fall asleep. Note that costs performance. Sleeping bodies have little CPU overhead.
